Workplace Definition: Safety needs relate to job security, physical safety, financial stability, and a supportive work environment.

Leadership Support:

  • Job Security: Provide clear communication about job stability and growth opportunities.
  • Health and Safety Protocols: Implement and communicate safety protocols and emergency procedures.
  • Supportive Culture: Foster a culture where employees feel psychologically safe to voice concerns or ideas.

Monitor Achievement:

  • Employee Retention Rate: Measure how many employees stay in the organization over a specified period.
  • Safety Incident Reports: Track the number of safety incidents and near misses in the workplace.
